00020 #ifndef CODEC_H_
00021 #define CODEC_H_
00022 
00023 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/ICodec.h>
00024 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/IContainerFormat.h>
00025 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/FfmpegIncludes.h>
00026 
00027 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler
00028 {
00029 
00030   class Codec : public ICodec
00031   {
00032     VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT_PRIVATE_MAKE(Codec)
00033   public:
00034     static Codec * make(AVCodec *);
00035     virtual const char * getName();
00036     virtual int getIDAsInt();
00037     virtual Type getType();
00038     virtual ID getID()
00039     {
00040       // Warning; this might not be protable
00041       ID retval = CODEC_ID_NONE;
00042       int id = getIDAsInt();
00043 
00044       // This cast is not defined in C++ when id is
00045       // not in ID.  That means if we're using a
00046       // newer version of LIBAVCODEC this might
00047       // give a bogus value for a Codec we don't
00048       // know about.
00049       retval = (ID)id;
00050       if (id != (int) retval)
00051       {
00052         // we assume some back and forth conversion failed...
00053         retval = CODEC_ID_NONE;
00054       }
00055       return retval;
00056     }
00057 
00058     // For calling from with C++, not Java.
00059     AVCodec * getAVCodec() { return mCodec; }
00060 
00061     static Codec *findEncodingCodec(const ICodec::ID);
00062     static Codec *findEncodingCodecByIntID(const int);
00063     static Codec *findEncodingCodecByName(const char*);
00064 
00065     static Codec *findDecodingCodec(const ICodec::ID);
00066     static Codec *findDecodingCodecByIntID(const int);
00067     static Codec *findDecodingCodecByName(const char*);
00068 
00069     static Codec *guessEncodingCodec(IContainerFormat* fmt,
00070         const char *shortName, const char*url, const char*mime_type,
00071         ICodec::Type type);
00072 
00073     virtual bool canDecode();
00074     virtual bool canEncode();
00075     virtual const char * getLongName();
00076     
00077     virtual int32_t getCapabilities();
00078     virtual bool hasCapability(Capabilities flag);
00079     
00080     virtual int32_t getNumSupportedVideoFrameRates();
00081     virtual IRational* getSupportedVideoFrameRate(int32_t index);
00082     
00083     virtual int32_t getNumSupportedVideoPixelFormats();
00084     virtual IPixelFormat::Type getSupportedVideoPixelFormat(int32_t index);
00085     
00086     virtual int32_t getNumSupportedAudioSampleRates();
00087     virtual int32_t getSupportedAudioSampleRate(int32_t index);
00088     
00089     virtual int32_t getNumSupportedAudioSampleFormats();
00090     virtual IAudioSamples::Format getSupportedAudioSampleFormat(int32_t index);
00091     
00092     virtual int32_t getNumSupportedAudioChannelLayouts();
00093     virtual int64_t getSupportedAudioChannelLayout(int32_t index);
00094     
00095 
00096 
00097     virtual int32_t acquire();
00098     virtual int32_t release();
00099   public:
00100     Codec();
00101     virtual ~Codec();
00102 
00103     AVCodec *mCodec;
00104   };
00105 
00106 }}}
